comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
The Dizzy Gillespie Orchestra played at the Downbeat Club July 18–August 28, 1947.
Ella Fitzgerald opened at the Downbeat on August 29.
(New York Amsterdam News, July 19, 1947, 19: ad. “Goings on About Town,” New Yorker August 30, 1947).
Here Fitzgerald has a guest appearance in the band.
(cf. Gottlieb interview on the Library of Congress site)

comment.author: 51986335@N02
comment._content: 8thlight: Thanks for your great suggestion! We went through and added notes to this photo and many others in the set. We'll continue to do so as more photos get loaded -- it helps to point out who's who!
